answerText: CCD [or charge-coupled devices][10] CCDs are one of many devices that take advantage of the properties of these materials, which can be n- or pdoped to alter the properties of their band gap.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 13 | 8 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: These devices commonly have an epitaxial layer of silicon on some substrate. [10] Name these imaging devices in which a pixel corresponds to a single potential well of electrons. When a photon hits the well, the charges move to a charge amplifier.
